text: Dolnik () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Międzylesie, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately east of Międzylesie, south of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Dolnik
title: Dolnik, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
